modName: More Powerful Reflection Shield and Auriels Shield Effect
summary: -Requires DG- More Powerful Reflection Shield and Auriels Shield Effect
descriptionHtml:
-Requires DG- 

More Powerful Reflection Shield and Auriels Shield Bash-Effect and Armor Rating.

I was bored letting people hit me 10 times before being able to blast them away with this shield, so I changed them. It doesn\'t conflict with any mod I can find, even those changing these items, just load this last. 

I am having an issue with it sometimes doing too much damage when bashing, looking for help, but most people seem to like it this way so I\'m posting it as-is for now.
author: SphereOfRa
